XinZhao.name: БXin ZhaoБ
XinZhao.title: Ббthe Seneschal of DemaciaГбБ
XinZhao.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШWhenever Jarvan III, the king of Demacia, delivers one of his rallying speeches from the glinting marble balcony atop the Royal Palace, Xin Zhao is at his side. Coined the Seneschal of Demacia, Xin Zhao is the personal steward of the Lightshield Dynasty. His enigmatic, silent vigil has led to an abundance of conjecture concerning his ''secret life'' and origins. Whether it's ''Zaun double-agent'' tendered at the dinner table or ''indebted rune mage'' mused in the editorials of the ''Demacian Constant'', Xin Zhao betrays no hints to sate the curiosity of the masses... for good reason.ШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчPrior to the formation of the League, Noxus was renowned for a spectacle called The Fleshing. It was a gladiatorial event with a cruel twist: as a fighter won matches, his number of opponents (generally prisoners of war) fought simultaneously would increase. This meant eventual death for every contender, but with unparalleled glory. Xin Zhao, known then as Viscero, was slated to face 300 soldiers, nearly six times the previous record. This was clearly meant to be his final match. Jarvan II, hearing of this unprecedented feat, infiltrated the arena to offer him an alternative: serve Demacia and punish those who ultimately sentence him to death in exchange for his freedom. Xin Zhao accepted, astonished that a king would risk his own life on his behalf. Under the cover of a prearranged Demacian assault on Noxus, Jarvan liberated Xin Zhao and his 300 opponents. During their retreat, Xin Zhao took a poisoned dart meant for Jarvan. This act of loyalty, from a man who vowed no allegiance, earned Xin Zhao a spot at his side until the day the king died. Now in the service of his son, Jarvan III, Xin Zhao is stepping into a new ring - the Fields of Justice - to fight for his adopted country and to honor the legacy of the man who gave purpose to his life.ШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгД''Death is inevitable, one can only avoid defeat.''ДгГбБ
БбГ - Demacian Manual of ArmsГбБ

allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиXin Zhao is a great initiator to combat. Lead the front to start a fight and use your ultimate to do the most damage possible.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗIt's often worth getting at least 1 point of Battle Cry to gain the health restore effect.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖTry to position yourself so your ultimate's knockback is most effectiveЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпXin Zhao is a powerful initiator with both his charge and ultimate dealing damage to all units around him. Try having your team stay spread out until he's used his ultimate.ПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлXin Zhao relies heavily on his Three Talon Strikes for damage and cooldown resets, so preventing him from finishing his combo will have a dramatic effect.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбThree Talon StrikeбБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлXin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage that reduce his other ability cooldowns, with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгXin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙ bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities' cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БBattle CryБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗXin Zhao passively heals every 3 attacks and can activate this ability to attack faster.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БPassive: ББбXin Zhao heals himself for ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})Бб every third basic attack.ГбБ

БActive: ББбГгДдXin Zhao unleashes a battle cry, increasing his attack speed by ЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}% for Б{{ e3 }}Б seconds.Б

spells.name: БбAudacious ChargeБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжXin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in the area.жЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдXin Zhao charges and challenges an enemy. The charge deals дДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+Б{{ a1 }})БбГгДд magic damage to all nearby enemies and slows them by ДгГбБ{{ e2 }}Бб% for 2 seconds. Б

spells.name: БбCrescent SweepБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйXin Zhao fiercely sweeps his spear around him, dealing damage to nearby enemies based on their current health and knocking them back.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДXin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals ДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+Б{{ f1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗз plus 15% of target's current health in physical damage and knocks enemies back. Xin Zhao gains ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГгДд Armor and Magic Resistance for 6 seconds for each champion hit.ЖдДгГбБ

БChallenge:ББбГгДдЖж If a challenged target is hit by the sweep, it is unaffected by the knockback.жЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: БChallengeБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиXin Zhao challenges his target with his basic attacks and Audacious Charge, reducing its armor by 15% for 3 seconds.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
